page.title: 17POLICE
page.content:
The{village}or{community policeman is responsible for law and order in the area.Although he is under orders from the police headquarters,the policeman covers a rural area of about 30 sq miles and is based at a small police station/house.The policeman works shifts the most common one being starting at 7.00a.m. and finishing at 3.00p.m. Much of the policemans time is spent dealing with burglaries,traffic problems and domestic arguments.In the absence of the lollipop lady ,the policeman will cross children over the road.The job the policeman dislikes most is informing people after a death and signing a death certificate. The policeman drives a small blue car or van to travel round his area.
{BY DARREN ,JAMES ,CARL & MATTHEW
